original_text: So David and his men got up early in the morning. They returned along the road back to Ziklag. The Philistine army went to Jezreel. So David and his men got up early in the morning. They returned along the road back to Ziklag. The Philistine army went to Jezreel.
korean_text: 이에 다윗이 자기 사람들과 더불어 아침에 일찍이 일어나서 떠나 블레셋 사람들의 땅으로 돌아가고 블레셋 사람들은 이스르엘로 올라가니라

sentences.original_text: So David and his men got up early in the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗과 그의 사람들은 아침 일찍 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: They returned along the road back to Ziklag
The Philistine army went to Jezreel
